info.name: Event Connect API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for Event Connect application with authentication, events, users, and admin endpoints

item.name: Authentication

body.raw:
{
    "name": "John Doe",
    "full_name": "John Doe",
    "email": "john@example.com",
    "password": "password123",
    "password_confirmation": "password123",
    "phone": "+6281234567890",
    "bio": "Software developer with 5 years experience",
    "role": "participant"
}

request.description: Login user and get access token
Logout user and revoke access token

item.description: Authentication endpoints for user registration, login, logout, and profile management

item.name: Events

query.description: Search term for events, organizers, or categories
Quick date filter (today, tomorrow, this_week, next_week, this_month, next_month)
Show only events with available spots
Sort by (start_date, price, title, popularity, created_at)

request.description: Advanced search and filter for events with multiple criteria
Get available filter options (categories, price ranges, date ranges, sort options)
Get popular search terms for autocomplete suggestions

query.description: Search term for events, organizers, or categories
Show only events with available spots
Sort by (start_date, price, title, popularity, created_at)

request.description: Get paginated list of events with advanced search and filters
Get specific event details by ID

body.raw:
{
    "title": "New Tech Conference",
    "description": "A comprehensive technology conference covering latest trends",
    "location": "Jakarta Convention Center",
    "start_date": "2024-12-01 09:00:00",
    "end_date": "2024-12-01 17:00:00",
    "quota": 100,
    "price": 200000,
    "status": "published",
    "category_id": 1
}

request.description: Get events created by current user (Organizer)
Get events user is participating in

item.description: Event management endpoints for CRUD operations

item.name: Event Participation

request.description: Join an event as a participant

response.name: Success with QR Code

originalRequest.description: Join an event as a participant

response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Successfully joined the event",
  "data": {
    "participant": {
      "id": 1,
      "user_id": 1,
      "event_id": 1,
      "status": "registered",
      "is_paid": true,
      "amount_paid": 0,
      "payment_reference": null,
      "attended_at": null,
      "created_at": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000000Z",
      "updated_at": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000000Z"
    },
    "event": {
      "id": 1,
      "title": "Sample Event",
      "start_date": "2024-01-15T10:00:00.000000Z",
      "location": "Jakarta Convention Center",
      "qr_code": "qr_codes/event_1234567890_abc123.png",
      "qr_code_url": "http://localhost:8000/storage/qr_codes/event_1234567890_abc123.png",
      "qr_code_string": "event_1234567890_abc123"
    }
  }
}

request.description: Get participants of an event (Admin/Organizer only)
Mark attendance via QR code scan

Get analytics data for charts and reports
